min_lifetime.description: The minimum lifetime of the EagleSpawner

max_lifetime.description: The maximum lifetime of the EagleSpawner

min_spawn_cooldown.description: The minimum cooldown time before next eagle will be spawned

max_spawn_cooldown.description: The maximum cooldown time before next eagle will be spawned

eagle_storm_radius.description: Defines the radius of the sphere around the player that should be scanned for enemies
